## VueI18nOptions interface

VueI18n Options

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface VueI18nOptions 
```

## Remarks

This option is compatible with the constructor options of `VueI18n` class (offered with vue-i18n<!-- -->@<!-- -->8.x).
